# CheckDisplayKey

## DisplayKeyColumnInvalidMeasurementType

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

A column used as table display key should be of Measurement/Type 'string' or 'number'.
